page.title: 05Hairstyles and Jewellery
page.content: Hairstyles tend to be short and straight for both men and women.Gel may be used to make hair stick up and people sometimes colour their hair bright colours.Some people use spring loaded clips called bulldog clips to tie their hair back.Earrings are worn mostly by women but some men wear earrings too.Some people don't just have one hole per ear they have two or three.Some people even have holes in their noses!Jewellery is mainly for women.Necklaces are either chains or beads strung on thread.Rings are circles put on the fingers.Brooches are designs worked in metal,clay or similar materials and they often have precious stones embedded in them.They are fastened to the clothes by pins. Scarves have printed on them patterns ranging from intriguing geometric designs to horses.
